subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just teh fact!
author: Lisby
full_text:
No, Chris is allowed to say he is talking to Barney for all I care.  
What I hear him doing is telling others that he knows better than  
they do. He does not. Period.

Ann

On Nov 29, 2007, at 8:28 PM, babiarz3 wrote:

> As far as I know, Chris was asked to take the box and was told that
> "they" wanted him to have it. I don't think "they" said to have him
> take it on loan like a library book.
>
> And just so I understand correctly... Everyone but Chris is allowed to
> state his opinions. Is that right?
>

> > > class – this research is done by Joe-Schmo in his basement and
> therefore
> > > open to many different interpretations and methodologies. Take
> the good –
> > > delete the bad. I believe in Karma – even if she is only my dog
> digging in
> > > my garden :-)

> first to

> far as I
> > > can tell. The portal thing is Hollywood! I use my equimpemt in my

> > > and have sinece 2000, amnd have never expereinced anything I could
> call evil
> > > beside soem cussing, nakme calling voices, which is hardly  
> threatening
> > > except to maybe 13 year old girl.
> > >
> > > I must point put, because of preivisou threats, that slander is
> stating
> > > something in public about a person that is knowingly untrue. So
> for anyone
